channel.title: Need help (PORT FORWARDING)
channel.description: Hey guys i really need help all the guides iv followed are really old i have new windows 8 and also got a newer router if someone would pm me maybe we can teamviewer please thanks!!! this is my def. gateway. [url=http://gyazo.com/52a2f0e2a1d14c166b4565fc0eeeaf36]http://gyazo.com/52a2f0e2a1d14c166b4565fc0eeeaf36[/url] this is what happeneds when i enable it. [url=http://gyazo.com/8003e15394a65059f15e4f2da60d9293]http://gyazo.com/8003e15394a65059f15e4f2da60d9293[/url] this is what is suppost to happen... [url=http://gyazo.com/310f57c9a150298381b2c984f6ed1990]http://gyazo.com/310f57c9a150298381b2c984f6ed1990[/url] and this is my router: [url=http://gyazo.com/4125a7b5e210c8dd9c0564ea9eddfb91]http://gyazo.com/4125a7b5e210c8dd9c0564ea9eddfb91[/url] Now you could please help, please message me team viewer skype please help!!

item.title: Need help (PORT FORWARDING)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“godog, post:13, topic:507995”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=626231.msg4259645#msg4259645 date=1363326698]

Still not solved i will make a quick new post to what is happening here…

Dude, don’t make new posts, edit this one.
I already showed you the issue. You can’t enable port forwarding. Contact comcast.

whoops but u cant contact comcast… i looked it up they charge you for something stupid like that maybe someone else knows how to solve it

I bitch at em all the time, and they don’t charge me?
[/quote]
whats there number? pm?[/quote]
1-800-XFINITY (1-800-934-6489)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help (PORT FORWARDING)
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

Contact your Internet sevice provider, and explain the issue with them, and that you want to portforward, they should be able to help you.
That’s what their there for.

Read full topic

this is the page that i got its my same router
http://media2.comcast.net/anon.comcastonline2/support/userguides/Wireless_Gateway_User_Guide_030811.pdf
add me on skype? or teamviewer? just pm?

[/quote]
yes i did it hard to explain what i am seeing you have to see it for yourself the guy above me we did screenshare and he couldnt figure it out either. i have team viewer or skype if you could help me…[/quote]
sigh pm your teamview.
